name: The Sergeant - Pareto
additionalNotes:
For many years, ACE Prime has been producing award-winning cigars for some of the most high-profile brands in the industry through Tabacalera Pichardo, their facility in Esteli, Nicaragua. Founded by Don Eradio Pichardo in 2005, Tabacalera Pichardo has developed an outstanding reputation for producing 
The Sergeant pays homage to the military “dedicated to the heroes who fight in anonymity, the ones who self sacrifice out of deep-rooted honor, regardless of recognition or acclaim.”The cigar is composed of a savory dark Ecuadorian Habano maduro wrapper with a Connecticut hybrid binder and a Nicaraguan filler. The Sergeant is expertly handmade at Tabacalera Pichardo in Nicaragua.
